amendment.description: Amendment specifies that the functions of the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs should place an emphasis on minimizing the burden on small businessess with 50 or fewer employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that the functions of the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs should place an emphasis on minimizing the burden on small businessess with 50 or fewer employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
